transcript: most environments are set up to punish people and all you do is you raise the bar of what it takes to not get punished people churn out of work they burn out they hate their jobs they hate their lives and I think that there's a better way and Layla and I are going to try and dedicate the rest of our lives to trying to prove that that is the mission of acquisition.com we can show that it's not just floofy stuff and I think if it were just Layla and people like oh it's a girl who's saying you should be nice to people but I think I given how I look how I talk I can probably deliver that message
